files.patch:
@@ -45,1 +45,5 @@
-using CanByteswapImpl = std::integral_constant<bool, (std::is_integral<T>::value && sizeof(T) <= 8)>;
+using CanByteswapImpl = std::integral_constant<bool, (std::is_integral<T>::value &&
+                                                      (sizeof(T) == 1 ||
+                                                       sizeof(T) == 2 ||
+                                                       sizeof(T) == 4 ||
+                                                       sizeof(T) == 8))>;
